channel.title: Bonus gold disappearing after client restart
channel.description:
#### What happened?
Gold equal to the amount gained from predictions throughout a match disappears after restarting game client
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen?
It's not supposed to disappear
#### Steps to reproduce:
After a match with a successful prediction, restart the game client
#### Comments:
Confirmed this after a game with a positive prediction rewarding me 9 gold and putting me at 1204, after restarting the client I had 1195
